sentences.en: Frankenstein was already turgid ; Percy made it more so.
sentences.cn: 《弗兰肯斯坦》已经是夸张的, 但珀西使它更夸张.

sentences.en: He succeeded in presenting Heidegger's often turgid style in a readable and idiomatic English.
sentences.cn: 译者成功地用一种朗朗上口的地道英文转达了海氏一贯铺张的写作风格.
他的文体华而不实, 令人厌烦.

sentences.en: It is quite a thirsty plant, so water every few days to keep it fresh turgid.
sentences.cn: 这是一种非常饥渴的植物, 每隔几天就要浇水来保持它新鲜饱满.

sentences.en: Rather than hiding their personalization capability under layers of turgid policy - speak , they should flaunt it.
sentences.cn: 与其让个性化功能隐藏在冗长的协议之下, 还不如大力宣扬这种功能.

sentences.en: The flowers are still crisp and turgid.
sentences.cn: 花朵尚处于鲜嫩,饱满状态.

sentences.en: The rest of the arts scene looks increasingly turgid by comparison.
sentences.cn: 比较而言，艺术界的其他领域看起来越发索然无味。

sentences.en: the turgid waters of the Thames
They have a mechanical function, allowing the cell to become turgid by osmosis, but preventing bursting.
sentences.cn: 通过渗透作用, 细胞壁可以渐渐涨大, 但不会涨到破裂的程度.

sentences.en: We get good media coverage for the launch of the new turgid.
sentences.cn: 我们新近推出的导游服务得到了媒体的好评.
